name: Ambush TD
description:
Tower defense game made for university project.

Map interaction

Map has resource field in it (wood and stone) that can be harvested. Player needs to hold mouse button on it and wait till interaction circle completes to get some resources. Resource fields can be depleted and become enemy path. It can lead to many different stategies because enemy path can be changed.

Tower ammunition system

Each tower has limited amount of ammo. When it gets low on ammunition you get to see warning indicator above tower, and when it's empty you see out of ammo indicator. Player can click the tower and hold till interaction circle completes to refill ammunition.

Special abilities

Player has to choose three special abilities at the start of the game. They can be used at any time if they are not on cooldown.

Currently there are only three abilities:

  • Freeze enemies
  • Reload all towers
  • Increase towers damage

Game is in early early beta. Any feedback would be appreciated.
